page.title: 10Modern Clothes
page.content: In 1985 clothes are made out of{nylon, {cotton,wool,denim,leather,felt,velvet {and cord.}Some of the shops that sell clothes are Woolworths,Asda,Marks and Spencer,B.H.S.,Harrods, M.A.Fashion, Top shop,Dorothy Perkins and lots of others.The fashion changes from season to season and year to year.In this time we have different types of people who wear different kinds of clothes, like{mods,punks and hippies etc.}In summer we wear light clothes mostly made of mesh and cotton.Some popular clothes are shorts,jeans,skirts,dress_ es,T.shirts and shirts.School clothes are mostly uniforms.Boys wear ties, shirts,trousers or shorts,and girls wear blouses,skirts,dresses,ties and boys and girls wear jumpers.Also in various schools they wear blazers and in most Primary schools children do not have to wear uniforms.
